import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Smartphone, Mail, Phone, MapPin, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tiktok, Youtube, ChevronDown } from 'lucide-react'; const Footer = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const footerLinks = { shop: [ { name: 'Smartphones', path: '/products?category=smartphone' }, { name: 'Accessories', path: '/products?category=accessory' }, { name: 'Cases', path: '/products?category=case' }, { name: 'Chargers', path: '/products?category=charger' }, { name: 'Headphones', path: '/products?category=headphones' }, ], support: [ { name: 'Contact Us', path: '/contact' }, { name: 'Shipping Info', path: '/shipping' }, { name: 'Returns', path: '/returns' }, { name: 'Warranty', path: '/warranty' }, { name: 'FAQ', path: '/faq' }, ], company: [ { name: 'About Us', path: '/about' }, { name: 'Careers', path: '/careers' }, { name: 'Press', path: '/press' }, { name: 'Investors', path: '/investors' }, { name: 'Sustainability', path: '/sustainability' }, ], ai: [ { name: 'AI Recommendations', path: '/ai-features#recommendations' }, { name: 'Smart Search', path: '/ai-features#search' }, { name: 'Chatbot Support', path: '/ai-features#chatbot' }, { name: 'Image Search', path: '/ai-features#image-search' }, { name: 'Smart Filters', path: '/ai-features#filters' }, ] }; const socialLinks = [ { name: 'Facebook', icon: Facebook, href: 'https://facebook.com' }, { name: 'Twitter', icon: Twitter, href: 'https://x.com' }, { name: 'Instagram', icon: Instagram, href: 'https://instagram.com' }, { name: 'Tiktok', icon: Tiktok, href: 'https://tiktok.com' }, { name: 'YouTube', icon: Youtube, href: 'https://youtube.com' }, ]; // Accordion state for mobile const [openSection, setOpenSection] = useState(null); const toggleSection = (section) => setOpenSection(openSection === section ? null : section); return (
